titles.title: Providing for consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 83) directing the President pursuant to section 5(c) of the War Powers Resolution to terminate the use of United States Armed Forces to engage in hostilities in or against Iran.

Providing for consideration of the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 83) directing the President pursuant to section 5(c) of the War Powers Resolution to terminate the use of United States Armed Forces to engage in hostilities in or against Iran.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-371, by Mr. McGovern.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 68.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-371, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for consideration of H. Con. Res. 83 with 2 hours of general debate.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 781.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 191 (Roll no. 5).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 193 (Roll no. 6).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Con.Res. 83 (directing the President to terminate the use of U.S. Armed Forces in hostilities in or against Iran unless certain conditions are met).
